pages.text: The $(mob)Ghast$() is a monster found in the $(thing)Nether$(). It floats around and shoots exploding fireballs at players on sight.$(p)These fireballs leave behind a fiery crater, but can also be reflected by hitting them with good timing.
$(mob)Ghasts$() drop $(item)Ghast Tears$() on death. They can be used to brew $(item)Potions of Regeneration$() or to craft $(item)End Crystals$().
